TopicTitle: The Official HypeTrain 0.90 Voyage Thread (Experimentals! Choo Choo Dangit!)

Articles.Content: I'm hyping even more now I've watched the 0.90 vids. Those editor tools give me some horrific ideas...
Editor Tools + Robotics Mod = Transformers.

I'll call the update 0.9 if I want... Maxmaps has on Squadcast streams, so why can't I?

I like these new building models... I also like how the 1st level Launchpad is just a circle of concrete on the ground, and the runway is just sand like the Island Runway... Nice touch

You're welcome to play 0.9 any time you want to, if you've still got a copy. It was apparently released on 12th August 2011 (I say apparently only because I'm just relying on a wiki and I wasn't playing KSP myself at that time). That's one reason that this update isn't 0.9, despite any misspeaking by anyone.

I'll call the update 0.9 if I want... Maxmaps has on Squadcast streams, so why can't I?QUOTE]

Max meant that he has been calling it that by accident. (I asked him this)

Maybe anyone who is insistent on calling it 0.9 should only be able to get actual 0.9 for a day after release.

I'll call the update 0.9 if I want... Maxmaps has on Squadcast streams, so why can't I?QUOTE]

Max meant that he has been calling it that by accident. (I asked him this)

Maybe anyone who is insistent on calling it 0.9 should only be able to get actual 0.9 for a day after release.

So was 0.9 actually 0.09?

Maybe anyone who is insistent on calling it 0.9 should only be able to get actual 0.9 for a day after release.

yes. they get it on Wednesday

So was 0.9 actually 0.09?

No, because version numbers, despite their superficial resemblance to decimal numbers, are not the same. Or do you believe that versions 0.10 - 0.19 logically come between versions 0.1 and 0.2, or that versions 0.20 - 0.25 logically come between versions 0.2 and 0.3 (ignoring for a moment that there are both separately identified versions 0.2 and 0.20, etc)

Also, if you look at the version number when you actually run the game, you'll probably observe a version number like 0.25.0.962. Since when do decimal numbers contain multiple decimal points, and what does it even mean?
The 0.90 preview of the editor tools has shown me what I missed and now I can't even build anything in 0.25 because of it.
i cant wait for 0.90.0. i think that using decimals like this is neccisary.

The 0.90 preview of the editor tools has shown me what I missed and now I can't even build anything in 0.25 because of it.

Ikr, it's a great update if it doesn't only bring the stuff you wanted, but also the stuff you didn't even know you wanted!
I think its safe to say the only mod I'll want to slap on 0.90 from the get go is Astronomer's Visuals. Everything else looks perfect
I just watched WinterOwl's video... Now I am all hyped as well
Is it out yet?Is it out yet?Is it out yet?Is it out yet?Is it out yet?
I don't know which of the two is hyping me the most. The fact that 0.90 is right the next corner or Freeman's Mind is about to end within December.

I don't know which of the two is hyping me the most. The fact that 0.90 is right the next corner or Freeman's Mind is about to end within December.

So you're hyped about something ending??

You really must hate it!!

Anyway release on Tuesday any HypeShuttle Tickets?? Really must find Overfloater...
Couple new builds on SteamDB. May Lord Kraken have mercy and may builds appear on scratchpad soon.

So you're hyped about something ending??

You really must hate it!!

Anyway release on Tuesday any HypeShuttle Tickets?? Really must find Overfloater...

Welp, if you watch the series, along with the fact that it took the creator about ten years to make it, you'll see what i mean (i don't hate the series, quite the opposite actually). Wht do you think the hype will be when the final release of KSP comes out?

Back on topic.

HYYYYYYYYYYYPE!!!

I have to present a 20min pitch tomorrow for a business plan... but all I can think about is how this new update is gonna be

BETA THAN EVER
I want to see it today, but I'm guessing either tomorrow or later this week
Uh oh. The infamous 502 errors have begun. The forums can't handle this much Hype!
My bet is still that 0.90 will release tomorrow.

There is so much hype, I'm starting to get Bad Gateway errors again!

Shakes fist at CalculusWarrior

There is so much hype, I'm starting to get Bad Gateway errors again!

So am I!

Here comes the wave of income for the companies that sell the F5 keys.
I think it may come out today.... maybe that's just hope. Also, the 502 errors are occuring, so something is happening. Also, maxmaps's recent tweets suggest that the release is coming very soon.

I think it may come out today.... maybe that's just hope. Also, the 502 errors are occuring, so something is happening. Also, maxmaps's recent tweets suggest that the release is coming very soon.
